description: Graphic design plays an essential role in our daily lives without a lot of people pay attention to the importance of the designer in their lives. In this course we will learn the basic graphic design tools and concepts of visual communication basics, as you will learn on the basis of composition and printing colors, fonts and other design elements. Will gain enrolled in this course knowledge about what is graphic design and what is its impact on daily we relate to life as we will learn how to look at the shapes from the viewpoint of the designer and will gain the basic skills of thinking within the concepts right and the foundations and applications through design and visual forms.
title: مقدمة في التصميم الجرافيكي
